definition: ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: Jam Ho is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Jam Ho and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 吳昭儀也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: Tactuality is no man but errs.
Neilson: And he's spent a lot of time with mortals at this point too.
sentences.chinese: 在這時，他也和凡人相處了很長一段時間了。

sentences.english: Rai Hu is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Rai Hu and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 李宥蓁也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: God uses ordinary people to do extraordinary work.
sentences.chinese: 上帝使用平凡人做不平凡的事。

sentences.english: Aya Ko is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Aya Ko and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 趙婉妤也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: Yap Ws is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Yap Ws and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 林姿杏也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: It is a sort of natural canonization.
sentences.chinese: 死亡是一種自然而然的超凡人聖。

sentences.english: This is the common fate of mortal men, useless it is to repine .
sentences.chinese: 這是凡人的共同命運，抱怨也沒有用。

sentences.english: Mortal always hard, love hate it when.
sentences.chinese: 凡人總難捨，愛過恨過也就罷了。

sentences.english: Which of these mortal hearts understands raillery ?
sentences.chinese: 這些凡人的心，有誰聽得懂玩笑？

sentences.english: I never want to view myself as any different or any better than anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有想過要活得異於凡人或出人頭地。

sentences.english: Kai Yu is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Kai Yu and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 呂嘉維也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: It can also be attained by people living an ordinary life, who have a job, are married and have kids.
sentences.chinese: 生活在俗世中有妻有子有工作的凡人也可以獲得。

sentences.english: Common people abide by the law and behave themselves so that they can avoid external punishment.
sentences.chinese: 一般凡人安份守己的地不犯法，可以免去外刑之災。

sentences.english: Try Wen is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Try Wen and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 黃韻珊也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
